entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
